content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Granada CF 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Granada CF 0.
Falcao (Atlético de Madrid) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Arda Turan following a fast break.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 2, Granada CF 0. Falcao (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Juanfran following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Koke (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Falcao.
